import React from 'react'; export default function Messages({}) { var MessagesArr = [] return ( <> { MessagesArr.map((message, index) => {

{pseudo} {date}

{message.text}
}) } ) } /*

{pseudo} {date}

{message.text}
:
handleOpenFile(message.file)} className="message-body-message-file">
Ouvrir
{message.text}
*/
